address: Xã Hợp Thành, Thành phố Hòa Bình, Tỉnh Hoà Bình
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Unit Change**

Okay, so I'm tackling this administrative geography question, starting with the old address "Xã Hợp Thành, Thành phố Hòa Bình, Tỉnh Hoà Bình". My approach is straightforward: I need to determine the new administrative unit for this old address.

First, the province. "Tỉnh Hoà Bình" is the old province. Looking at the established resolutions (60-NQ/TW), I quickly find that "Tỉnh Hoà Bình" was merged with other provinces to form "Tỉnh Phú Thọ." So, that's the starting point for the search.

Now, focusing on the specific "Xã Hợp Thành" – the old ward or commune. My strategy is to scour other relevant resolutions for any mention of "Xã Hợp Thành" within the context of the old or new province name.

I've examined a series of resolutions: 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15, 1655/NQ-UBTVQH15, 1656/NQ-UBTVQH15, 1660/NQ-UBTVQH15, 1663/NQ-UBTVQH15, 1664/NQ-UBTVQH15, 1666/NQ-UBTVQH15, 1669/NQ-UBTVQH15, and 1672/NQ-UBTVQH15. None of these have relevant information on "Xã Hợp Thành". The only resolution that shows any possible relevance (1672/NQ-UBTVQH15) mentions "Hợp Thành" as part of the new "phường Kỳ Lừa" within the "Thành phố Lạng Sơn." However, the requested address is "Thành phố Hòa Bình", and "Lạng Sơn" is a different province.

So, at this point, I don't see any explicit change for "Xã Hợp Thành" at the ward level and will continue the search in other documents.

citation.line: 4. Hợp nhất tỉnh Vĩnh Phúc, tỉnh Phú Thọ và tỉnh Hoà Bình; lấy tên là tỉnh Phú Thọ
